owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

previousOwner().details: Returns the address of the previous owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without an owner. It won't be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
